DOC.brief_summary: A specific aim determine Indocyanine Green ( ICG ) administer pre-operatively , image intraoperatively use camera aid identification suspect central nervous system ( CNS ) tumor . A secondary aim understand use ICG surgery correlate MR image finding include elevated Cho/Cr ratio , rCBV , Ktrans contrast enhancement .
DOC.brief_title: Indocyanine Green Central Nervous System Tumors
DOC.criteria: Adult patient 18 year age old . Patients present CNS tumor presume resectable risk local recurrence preoperative assessment Good operative candidate determine treat physician multidisciplinary team Subject capable give informed consent participate process consent . Pregnant woman determine urinary serum beta hCG within 72 hour surgery Subjects history iodide allergy Vulnerable patient population . Patients unable participate consent process ( child neonates ) . Patients nonMRI compatible implant metallic foreign body exclude study '' Patients due severe claustrophobia tolerate MRI scanning '' Patients know allergy hypersensitivity MRI contrast agent include gadolinium .
